author: Gian Piero Ciammariconi
comment: Nice idea but difficult to read time in it. Plus, I can't find the settings anywhere.

reply.author: rebiskis
reply.content:
I updated the watch face. Now it's a heart for every hour, so will be easy to read, and for 3,6,9,12 it's a bigger heart.
For settings please open on your phone Android Wear and on Watch faces select Love (current watch face) and now you will see a settings icon over the preview of watch face. Click on that settings icon to go to settings.
Thanks.

title: Not very readable
